item.title: Stay Fit & Get Your Caffeine Fix with AI-Powered Squat Detection
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction What if your workout routine could be seamlessly integrated with a reward system that acknowledges your efforts with something as delightful as a cup of coffee? We’ve developed a unique approach to fitness with a technological spin: using face-recognition from the AIY Vision Kit to detect squats and reward you with a free coffee after your exercise. The Concept This idea leverages a face-detection model to monitor a person’s face within a video feed.
